column4: so how come ubuntu 11.04 wouldnt install automaticly on my windows 7 pc. it set up the partitions perfectly but wouldnt install. i tried 3 times
yes, i downloaded .iso file several times 64-bit version
looked like it was going to be an easy, perfect install on my second hard drive, it hunf g at the very end of the install process, and never installed anything
Did you Md5sum the ISO, prior to burning at the slowest speed?
